SELECT 0 AS checkShop, a.ireser, a.ishop, b.name, a.date, a.request, if(TIMESTAMPDIFF(minute,a.`date`,NOW()) >= 0,2,a.confirm) AS confirm, a.created_at AS createdAt, a.head_count AS headCount, if(c.iuser IS NULL, 0 , 1) AS isBook, d.pic FROM t_reservation a JOIN t_shop b ON a.ishop= b.ishop LEFT JOIN t_shop_bookmark c ON a.ishop= c.ishop AND a.iuser= c.iuser LEFT JOIN t_shop_pic d ON a.ishop= d.ishop WHERE a.iuser = #{iuser} AND a.confirm = 0 GROUP BY a.ireser UNION SELECT 1 AS checkShop, e.ipickup AS ireser, e.ibutcher AS ishop, b.name, e.date, e.request, if(TIMESTAMPDIFF(minute,e.`date`,NOW()) >= 0 ,2 ,e.confirm) AS confirm, e.created_at AS createdAt, 0 AS headCount, if(c.iuser IS NULL, 0 , 1) AS isBook, d.pic FROM t_pickup e JOIN t_butcher_shop b ON e.ibutcher= b.ibutcher LEFT JOIN t_but_bookmark c ON e.ibutcher= c.ibutcher AND e.iuser= c.iuser LEFT JOIN t_butcher_pic d ON e.ibutcher= d.ibutcher WHERE e.iuser = #{iuser} AND e.confirm = 0 GROUP BY e.ipickup ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}
SELECT SUM(count) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM t_reservation WHERE iuser= #{iuser} union SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM t_pickup WHERE iuser= #{iuser}) a
